item.title: How do you add the ::fly command for my server IP?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

by ::fly…do you mean like the ::god command where you float…and when you move you fly around like superman?

EDIT: if you mean that…then here is the command you would add… also…this states that it is for Mods and above

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("You Can Now Fly o.O"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("land") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("You Have Landed..."); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
